resources.string: Monokia pūrua te. E hiahia ana koe ki te whakarite i ngā tautuhinga pūrua, me te pupuri tēnei whakamaumahara?
%s He whakaaro atu tata matua ranei, ko koutou te hiahia koe ki te whakamahi i tēnei kotahi pakeke?
Kei te tīariari kē te ingoa kōnae %s. Tuhirua?
Te kore te Pūkete Google anake ka taea ki te tuku, NOT riro karere ki a koutou. E hiahia ana koe ki te tāpiri i tētahi pūkete Google?
Te hinaaro nei tatou i to koutou āwhina whakapai SafeSlinger. E hiahia ana koe ki te tuku aunoa tetahi hapa ki a matou?
Te tahi mau melo e te whakamahi i te putanga tawhito; me i iti whakamahi ngā mema katoa %s.
Me whakahōu te mau melo o te katoa, etahi kei te whakamahi i ngā matua pakeke.
Me whakahōu te mau melo o te katoa, etahi kei te whakamahi i ngā pakeke rēhita pana.

Kāore e taea te whakahōu i te pātengi raraunga ki te kaiwhiwhi.
Whakamahia tēnei mata ki te whakatakotoria tou ingoa, waea, me te īmēra ki te whakawhiti ki ētahi atu. Paoa i te pātene \' Fai \', ka mutu.
Ki te whakawhiti raraunga tuakiri, te whakarite kei tata ranei i runga i te waea kaiwhakamahi katoa. Ka whakawhiti pātene te \' Kamata Exchange \' te raraunga whakapā takina anake.

\n\nkia hoki e koe te huri i ngā raraunga whaiaro e pā ana ki o koutou i runga i tenei tuakiri mata i te ingoa i runga i te pātene ki tou ingoa. Tenei ka whakaatu te tahua tuku koe ki te \' Whakatika \' to koutou whakapā, \' Waihanga New \' whakapā, \' Whakamahia tētahi atu \' whakapā ranei.
Ka whakaatu tēnei mata i ngā karere o mua katoa, me ngā tāpiritanga e wātea ana mō te download he tonu.
Whakamahia tēnei mata ki te takiuru ki te tono ki to koutou kīangahipa.
Kua whakaaturia ngā Hoapā ki te mau taviri SafeSlinger konei, tīpako i tetahi ki te tuku i tō karere ki te.
A, no ka oti, ka te kawa whakakitea he rārangi o te raraunga tuakiri hokona. Tīpakohia te whakapā e hiahia ana koe ki te whakaora me te pēhi \' Kawemai \'.
Mā tēnei mata ki a koe te tīpako e rua iwi kua piua atu e koe mau taviri ki te aroaro o ki he wehi unga ratou mau taviri ki tetahi ki tetahi. Noa pēhi \' whakataki ki \' ka rite.
Mā tēnei mata ki a koe te tīpako i ētahi raraunga me te kaiwhiwhi ki te tuku ki te. Noa pēhi \' Tukua \' ka rite.
Tīpakohia te tokomaha o te iwi i te hunga e whakamātau ana ki te whakawhiti tahi raraunga, me te pēhi \' OK \'.

Tenei tau i runga i tenei mata whakamahia ki te hanga i tētahi rōpū motuhake o ngā kaiwhakamahi. Te arotake i te tau i runga i ngā kaiwhakamahi katoa \' ngā mata, na kia tomo kaiwhakamahi katoa te maha i raro taua, me te pēhi i te \' OK \'.
Na, me taurite ki a koe tetahi o enei kupui lea 3 - kupu ki ngā kaiwhakamahi katoa. Me tīpako i nga kaiwhakamahi i te kīanga noa taua, me te pēhi \' Next \'.

Hangaia %1$s

SafeSlinger ki te tiri raraunga tuakiri, te tangata i roto i runga i te waea ranei, whakamotuhēhē, tümataiti, me te whakaū tonu. Ia tangata faaite koe ki te hanga i tētahi hongere haumaru mutunga - ki - mutu ki te unga karere.

Ngā Whakaaturanga:
- ngāwari te whakawhiti pārongo whakapā ki ētahi atu
- humarie piua tuhinga, whakaahua, tetahi mea!
- kaha tuhiwhakamuna tiaki koutou mōhiohio
